entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:50 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
